attributes.title: TERRIBLE 🤮🥱😒
attributes.review: this app isn’t good at all. i got the app and it took so long to download. then my dog started barking and wouldn’t stop. i deleted the app and my dog finally stopped barking. when i got the app again my dog started barking all over again and seriously wouldn’t stop. it’s as if my dog knows what a monster trumps uglyass is. anyway, this app is trash and you’re trash if you get it. i hope you all take this very seriously and don’t get the app. i haven’t slept for days because my dog wouldn’t stop barking. in general, the app is trash. like why get a trump app when you can get tiktok?

attributes.title: RUINED MY WHOLE LIFE 😱
attributes.review: WTHHHH I HATE THIS APP😾 I DOWNLOADED THE APP BECAUSE I WANTED TO SUPPORT MY lovely president🍆🪓, and everything was fine I left the app turned off my phone📱and all the DEVICES IN MY CASA STARTED TO PLAY ✨it’s a small world after all✨ MY MOM got scared😱she Went to the roof of the house got on her private jet and Never😡came back, we had to stay with😪our dad but then all the phones in his house filled with debby Ryan memes and all my apps deleted except this TRASHY ONE and on my brothers phone he got Donald trumps 🍤HE IS NOW IN THE HOSPITAL 🏥 I think he lost eye vision😭I can’t even imagine what he had to see 🤮🤮DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS TO NO ONE😁. BLACK LIVES FREAKEN MATTER you FREAK.✊🏻✊🏼✊🏽✊🏾✊🏿

attributes.title: App sold my identity 🤬
attributes.review: When I downloaded the app, it asked me for some personal information, which I thought was fine, maybe the administration just wanted to know what sort of demographic supported our president. But then it got very weird. I got a call from my bank; the app had stolen my information and tried to make a $5000 donation to the Trump campaign 🤬🤬🤬 I cancelled the transaction immediately, and then started receiving emailed pictures of myself through my window saying “we’re watching” 😨. Needless to say, I’m terrified. This app put my life and livelihood in danger. DO NOT DOWNLOAD.

attributes.title: 🚫 DO NOT DOWNLOAD. BEWARE. ⚠️
attributes.review: If I could give this 0 stars I would. This app took a full month to download on my phone, and while it was downloading I was not able to use my phone. Completely lost all functionality. I wasn’t even able to pause or end the download. Unfortunately, they wasn’t even the worst of it. As soon as it FINALLY finished downloading, my phone kept glitching. Any time I would open another app, it would redirect me back to this one. I also kept getting warnings about Russian spyware on my device. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP IF YOU KNOW WHAT IS GOOD FOR YOU. APPLE STORE, PLEASE PULL THIS APP. YOU ARE ENDANGERING YOUR CUSTOMERS.

attributes.title: I wish zero stars were an option
attributes.review: I downloaded the app to get more prospective on our Dear Leader, but as soon as I opened the app, it asked for my phone number. Weird flex, but okay. I gave them it and all of a sudden my phone crashed and had to restart. When I restarted my phone, I saw that my background and lock screen were different. I saw the devil holding a white power symbol with his hand, and the whole picture has a red tint to it. I’m very worried that I just sold my life to the anti-christ and that he is using this app as malware disguised as a campaign app. DO NOT GET THE MARK OF THE BEAST!!

attributes.title: Absolutely not ❤️💫
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and obviously had high hopes because our president can take the time to make it but not rule America 😍🥰❤️. However after I downloaded, it told me to give my phone number and after I did my phone was completely of no use for two days 😡💔. The phone screen kept bugging and showing random stuff like I got hacked or something. Needless to say I got my phone fixed and will not be getting the app again 👁👄👁. Anyways I hope orange bunker boy will fix the app, or America by resigning 😍. Do not download this app ❤️.

attributes.title: ABSOLUTLEY TRASH!!!!
attributes.review: this app stole all of my info. whoever was running this app made sure they knew my entire family and my address. they showed up to my house , kidnapped me and made me prank call all of my family telling them to pay him a ransom . then finally they said that trump wanted all this and that he was expecting me. he twisted my nipples and used my afro as a mop... he said bc ik black that i don't deserve to have anything good in the country. and he said that bc his leader donald trump was racist that he can get away with mistreating all the minorities in america bc trump has got his back. IF I COUKD GIVE THIS APP 0 STARS I WOULD!!!!

attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: So I was bored on tik tok *cogh cogh* what he was about to band and stuff so I downloaded this and straight when I downloaded it it took all my data and why he stilling people popcorn I was so sad when he stole my popcorn what ya girl gotta eat anyways I had to do a whole garage sell to get back my freaking pop corn and when I tell y’all I had to reset my phone I had to anyways don’t download it blows up ur phone it steals ur food u have to do a garage sell y’all I was so sad it Evan said trump is a orange 🍊 phones neva lie 👀👀anyway dont unless u love trump *cogh cogh* not me but yall my microwave dont wirk cause it took my popcorn😭

attributes.title: Walking CHEETO PUFF🤮⚠️🦠
attributes.review: Wow first off worst app in my entire existence of life. This is just unbearable if I wanted to see a Cheeto puff I’d just go to the store and buy chips but this one talks and it’s stupid and bonkers and overall just a lunatic. The app glitches on my phone too many times. Took all my data off my phone without my permission. Shoot almost broke my screen when the Cheeto puff came on. Not to mention it gave nausea just to see him. But I definitely would NOT recommend to anyone!! How definitely be “devastated” if the app got deleted whoops. Have a nice day and remember BLM so go sign a petition!!!!

attributes.title: AWFUL DO NOT DOWNLOAD 🙅🏽‍♀️❌
attributes.review: I decided to download so I could be more informed about our president and what he’s doing to help. As soon as I downloaded it my phone would not stop playing music it kept blasting deepthroat by cupcake 🧁 it was so embarrassing I was on a zoom call when it happened not only did it play that song but It also erased all my photos and contacts. If I could give this negative stars I would 1000% do it with out a doubt. Whatever you don’t download this app it’s not good for you and in my opinion it did not pass the vibe get at all DO NOT DOWNLOAD ‼️‼️ it a no❤️ for me.
